channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A46 flyover being used as lorry parking, 2nd July
item.description:
Could you investigate lorries parking on the fly over please. A46 flyover the A417. See photos of a recent example.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road Junction, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow lines needed on Old Bath Road, 2nd July
item.description:
There are double yellow/no parking lines on Charlton Lane but none on Old Bath Road on the other side of a very busy junction and pedestrian crossing. Can this be rectified please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 201, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Double yellows and slow sign faded, 2nd July
item.description:
Which may be why nobody pays attention to them. Please could these be repainted; if there are any bollards which can be put up to stop people parking here even better. It's really dangerous and people ignore the road signs. We could do with a "slow" sign on the other side of the road as well please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 275, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Explicit graffiti on public footpath, 2nd July
item.description:
Opposite 38 Cedar Rd Brockworth GL3 4DL

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Cedar Road, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 2nd July
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure please cut back overgrown hedges and brambles obstructing the footway back to boundary approx 20m x 1m x 2m (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 2nd July
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure required please replace x1 broken 900x150x40mm kerb stone number 4 stats required (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 2nd July
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 2nd July
item.description:
